item.title: TV Show Reviews and Ratings
item.description: Personal TV show reviews and ratings covering drama, comedy, sci-fi, and reality TV. Honest opinions on what's worth watching and what to skip.

item.title: Book Reviews and Reading List
item.description: Curated book reviews and ratings from an AI/ML engineer and vegan advocate. Featuring philosophy, science fiction, non-fiction, and social theory recommendations.

item.title: Movie Reviews and Film Recommendations
item.description: Personal movie reviews and ratings from a San Francisco-based film enthusiast. Discover hidden gems, classics, and contemporary cinema with honest ratings.

item.title: Vegan Recipes by Itsi Weinstock
item.description: Workshopped vegan recipes including Asian classics like Mapo Tofu, Kimchi Jigae, and comfort foods like Goulash and Mushroom Korma. All tested and perfected.

item.title: Tea Reviews and Tasting Notes
item.description: Comprehensive tea reviews covering pu-erh, oolong, white, and black teas from White2Tea, Yunnan Sourcing, and specialty vendors. Detailed tasting notes and recommendations.

item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: Food, Music, Books, Tea, Vegan Propaganda

item.title: Designing Good AI Agent Systems with Evaluations
item.description: Intro concepts Evals and the data flywheel are what will make or break AI products Evals are the base infrastructure to do future work on prompt engineering, few-shot learning, RAG, and fine-tuning.

item.title: The Metamorphosis
item.description: Franz Kafka, 1915, an absurdist? modernist? Novella I’m sure tons has been written about this bad boy, but I’m going to take a crack at it before reading any other analyses, then see later if I’m stupid.

item.title: A Psalm for the Wild-Built
item.description: Becky Chambers, 2021, a Science Fiction/Solarpunk Novella The story is set in a post-AI utopia, where the robots, upon gaining consciousness, fled into the wild, and humanity rebuilt its society with a reverence to nature, including technology.
